eight_a_pos_taxes.question_text: Please upload the applicant firm’s Federal tax returns filed in the last three years, including all schedules and attachments.

eight_a_pos_revenue_a.question_text: Is NAICS code for which the applicant firm is applying to the 8(a) Business Development Program the same as the applicant firm’s primary NAICS code listed in SAM.gov?

eight_a_pos_revenue_b.question_text: Has the applicant firm earned revenues in its primary NAICS code for at least two years?

eight_a_pos_revenue_c.question_text: What percentage of revenues were earned in the applicant firm’s primary NAICS code during the most recently completed fiscal year?

eight_a_pos_revenue_d.question_text: Please list current and past Federal and non-Federal awarded contracts within the last 12 months.

eight_a_pos_revenue_e.question_text: Please upload an interim or year-end balance sheet and profit and loss statement.

eight_a_pos_other.question_text: Do you have any loan agreements that are not commercial bank loans?

eight_a_pos_pos_a.question_text: Do you have any special licenses under which the applicant firm operates?

eight_a_pos_pos_b.question_text: Do you have statements of bonding ability from the applicant firm’s surety?
